thread.title: French woman with Down's Syndrome fulfils TV dream to present weather forecast
thread.title_full: French woman with Down's Syndrome fulfils TV dream to present weather forecast

author: Charlotte Krol
title: French woman with Down's Syndrome fulfils TV dream to present weather forecast
text:
French woman with Down's Syndrome fulfils TV dream to present weather forecast Watch | French woman with Down's Syndrome fulfils TV dream 00:42 Charlotte Krol , video news producer, video source France 2 15 March 2017 â€¢ 9:07am 
A French woman with Down's syndrome presents the weather forecast on Tuesday after a Facebook campaign made her dream possible. 
The charity effort " Melanie peut le faire ", or Melanie can do it, has been supported by more than 200,000 people to promote awareness and inclusion.
